Project.Notes:
This template is used to migrate System Class CIs and relationships from BMC Remedy ITSM to ServiceNow. It can be used with most legacy ITSM versions including 764, 8.1 and 9.1 servers. It should be run AFTER the migration of all foundation data (see separate template for this).
Whilst every care has been taken in constructing this template, Service Management Integrations accept no liability for the accuracy of the data migration definitions and you should therefore carefully check that the migrations are suitable for your environment before executing.
Service Management Integrations strongly recommend that you take backups of all sensitive data before executing any data migration projects and always run the migration project on a non-production test server in the first instance.
Amendment History R2: Updated mappings to take advantage of 3.2 functionality R3: Added support for multi-tenancy with company variables; moved CI relationships to separate project. Changed all reference fields to lookup mappings Added field mapping for WorkLog to Comments

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [ClassId] = 'BMC_ADMINDOMAIN' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [DatasetID] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: ((((('Remedy Asset ID: ' + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description])

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [Class Id] = 'BMC_APPLICATION' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [Data Set Id] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: ((((('Remedy Asset ID: ' + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description])

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [Class Id] = 'BMC_INVENTORYSTORAGE' AND [Name] != 'Default' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [Data Set Id] = #DataSet#
[ClassID] = 'BMC_MAINFRAME' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [DatasetID] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: ((((('Remedy Asset ID: ' + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description])

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [ClassId] = 'BMC_NTDOMAIN' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [DatasetID] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: ((((((('Client Site Name: ' + [ClientSiteName]) + ' Remedy Asset ID: ') + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description])

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [ClassID] = 'BMC_PRINTER' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [DatasetID] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: ((((('Remedy Asset ID: ' + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description])

DataMappingsDefinition.SourceQuery: [Class Id] = 'BMC_SOFTWARESERVER' AND ((#Single Company# = TRUE AND [Company] = #Company Name#) OR #Single Company# = FALSE) AND [Data Set Id] = #DataSet#

FieldMapping.Assignment: (('Server Type: ' + [Software Server Type]) + (((((' Remedy Asset ID: ' + [Asset ID+]) + ' Description: ') + [Short Description]) + ' Additional Information: ') + [Description]))
